{{Wireless embedded system |brand=OvisLink |model=N450R |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/07/2012 |manuf_country= |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model=CDW68AAM-U01 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=ODMN450R,PBLCDW68AAMU01 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3883 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=PieceMakers |ram1_model=PME809416BBR-E7DN |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3883 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT5392 |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=airlive2.4,airlive5g |default_ssid_regex=^airlive2.4$,,,^airlive5g$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=airlive |oui=00:4F:67 |oui_eth=00:4F:67 }} ''750Mbps Wireless-N Beam-forming IPv6 Gigabit Router''
[http://www.airlive.com/product/n450r Product page]
[http://fs.airlive.com/manual/AirLive_N450R_Manual.pdf Manual] "11340Y20IU00003B1" and "2011/08/09" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. [http://openrouter.info/forum/viewtopic.php?p=17951 On openrouter.info], post by ''obsy'' :16MB Flash, 64MB RAM :Serial pinout: (Pin 1) <-- VCC, RX, TX, GND This device appears to be a [[AMIT CDW68AAM-U01]]. The FCC ID of the parent OEM product (PBLCDW68AAMU01) has been assigned to this entry. The default SSIDs for this device appear to be '''airlive2.4''' (or perhaps '''airlive2.4g''') and '''airlive5g'''. There are two entries for the 2.4GHz SSID on WiGLE.. and one for the 5GHz SSID. 00:4F:67 is presumed to be the OUI used.
